featured.text: They sprayed pesticide from the air.
Other groundbreaking products, including Omega-3 capsules, cold virus pretreatment sprays, and dog snacks are made from what was once cod catch detritus.

definition.en_def: A liquid that is forced out in a fine mist or a device that produces such a mist.
definition.example: She used a spray to keep the plants hydrated.
